dialogue: I must say you are full of surprises.
[color=shadow]Shadow[/color]! I was just about to contact you, the database is...
Empty?
Ho- How do you know that?
Well, I will get to that later. But first...
I gave you this task because I thought for sure it would be near impossible.
But how disappointing, I could have done this myself with my eyes closed.
I guess that’s what you get for believing in the Government.
Slow down, what are you even talking about.
Well, the point is... you have shown me that you are too dangerous. You might become a threat to my corporation.
No no, I would never...
There’s no guarantee of it, so yeah... I’ve decided to dispose of you.
[color=whispher]I need to get out of here, fast-[/color]
Don’t even bother, I’ve already alerted the Government about YOUR secret mission.
You won’t get away with this!
See... the thing is, I’ve ALREADY gotten away with it. And for the cherry on top...
Stop talking-
That’s right, you have NEVER escaped on your own. Now, good luck getting through all these antiviruses! HA HA HA!
This- This isn’t over, [color=shadow]Shadow[/color]! I will take you down, I will bring you to justice!
Come now, we both know there’s no point in chasing [color=shadow]shadows[/color] ...
Oh and make sure you repent while in your jail cell.[color=shadow]Shadow[/color] out~...
Calm down... I need to get out of here before I can think of anything else.
Can I actually do this? Or should I just turn myself in.
There’s so many antivirus guards... My odds of escaping is negative at this point.
No.. I can’t give up here. I need to take him down. I will bring him to justice!
